= Getting Started =

Download simplex3dMath.jar and add it to your classpath. In your scala file, use the following imports:
{{{
import simplex3d.math._ // Using primitive casting.
import simplex3d.math.doublem.renamed._ // Using short names for Double data types.
import simplex3d.math.doublem.DoubleMath._ // Using all double functions.
}}}
